message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm aiming to sell it for around $12,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your suggestion, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $9,000 for the product.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me.  This product is truly top-of-the-line and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I believe $10,500 is still too high for my budget. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for it.
